marklogic.body:
Great article! As Countryman notes, however, the founders were counting on the Electorial College to do the vetting as Hamilton says in Federalist #68. His argument for the Electorial College, in fact, was based on this very point, to prevent foreign powers from getting a "creature of their own" into the highest office of the land.
We have an independent agency of the Executive Branch, that came into power after WWII over which there is little oversight: the CIA. Until that agency's work is placed under the Department of Defense, we are in danger. It is out of out of Reach of the normal checks and balances the founders thought necessary. Is not Barack Obama a CIA product as well as Osama Bin-Laden? Did the CIA's recruitment of Muslims during the Cold War, taking over from the Nazi's recruitment, lead to this current situation? Read Ian Johnson's A MOSQUE IN MUNICH and draw your own conclusions.
